summary: A buddy comedy about a high school tech-whiz whose prom day abruptly shifts into a wild ride across town, thanks to a down-on-her-luck cop and a jewel thief.
cast: Laura Marano|Leigh-Allyn Baker|Christian Campbell|Alain Goulem|Christian Paul|Kiana Madeira|Jake Manley|Zoé De Grand Maison|Mike Paterson|Pauline Little|Angela Galuppo|Mylène St-Sauveur|Susan Almgren|Kwasi Songui|Michael Romano|Christian Service|Andre Bedard|Steve Nash|Vlad Stokanic|Christopher de Courcy-Ireland|Andy Quesnel|Marc Rowland|George Maniatopoulos|Pat Lemaire|Trevor Momesso|Dean Hagopian|David Pryde|Adam Reid|Brian Alexander|Karen Belfo|Nathaly Thibault
title: Un día de pelos
